name: sonolus-pjsekai-engine
description: A recreation of Project Sekai: Colorful Stage! engine in Sonolus
author: NonSpicyBurrito

scripts.prebuild: tsc -p ./lib --noEmit && tsc -p ./shared --noEmit && tsc -p ./play --noEmit && tsc -p ./preview --noEmit && tsc -p ./tutorial --noEmit && eslint --ext .cts ./lib && eslint --ext .mts ./shared && eslint --ext .mts ./play && eslint --ext .mts ./preview && eslint --ext .mts ./tutorial
